en.banner_describe: Is committed to becoming OpenStack's leading open source cloud computing education and training.
en.devops_detail_first: TongFang cloud Devo's DevOps training course is divided into two broad categories:
en.devops_detail_four: TongFang cloud DevOps training courses are divided into 203,403,603 three levels.
en.devops_detail_three: Involving fault tracking management, version control, job building, job guard, code review, server lifecycle management, task scheduling, configuration management, software packaging and warehouse management and so on.
en.feature_detail: TongFang cloud Cloud is the first OpenStack cloud service provider in China to launch a large-scale, commercial managed service and maintenance service. Based on more than 3 years of DevOps experience, DevOps training courses help students master the better operation and maintenance methodology and are familiar with DevOps language and tools, familiar with project development projects, toolchains, and the ability to project deployment, o&m  and other related operations into a safe, simple tool or command.
en.preview_description: TongFang has a cloud competency based on competency roles, role definitions for technology development or technical service related positions, and is not limited to: operations team and implementation team with project manager Based on the role definition, including OpenStack Ops certification courses, Solution Architect certification courses, DevOps certification courses and other four categories of professional OpenStack technology certification system, To facilitate the self-positioning of students, in accordance with the ability to target the job design blueprint.
en.split_list_intro_four: Open source cloud to 100% manufacturers have nothing to do
en.split_list_intro_one: Four major technical team certification system professional grading curriculum
en.split_list_intro_two: Courseware, homework, exam the whole process to create professional
en.split_list_title_three: Enrich experimental courses focus on best practices
en.list_one_detail: Four major technical team certification system
en.list_two_detail_two: The whole process to create professional
en.title: TongFang cloud - Training
en.us_detail: Open source cloud computing has an important feature is all-encompassing, almost all areas of IT technology are included, the depth and breadth of human knowledge is extremely high, UnitedStack cloud knowledge course is to help all technical lines of engineers for the follow-up High-strength professional training to lay the foundation. The course applies to all technical line engineers, including R & D, solution architects, project managers, operation and maintenance, implementation, technical services and other roles.

zh.banner_brief: 成就 OpenStack 技术专家
zh.banner_describe: 同方云培训，致力于为有志于OpenStack的你提供体系的、专业的、领先于业界的开源云计算教育和培训，帮助你提高综合理论水平、培养实战技能、掌握开源云全局观，从而能够正确地、专业地把事情做好，上能仰望开源云浩瀚星空，下能游刃于开源技术一线。
zh.banner_describe_mobile: 专业的、领先于业界的开源云计算教育和培训，帮助你提高综合理论水平
zh.devops_detail_first: 同方云的 DevOps 培训课程分为两个大类:
zh.devops_detail_four: 同方云 DevOps 培训课程分为203、403、603三个级别。
zh.devops_detail_three: 涉及故障追踪管理、版本控制、作业构建、作业守护、代码审查、服务器生命周期管理、任务编排、配置管理、软件打包和仓库管理等等。
zh.feature_detail: 同方云是中国第一家推出规模性、商用化托管运维服务的 OpenStack 云服务商，基于3年多的专业 DevOps 经验推出的 DevOps 培训课程，帮助学员掌握较好的运维方法论，并熟悉 DevOps 语言及工具，熟悉项目的开发工程、工具链、了解架构及开发细节，并有能力将项目部署、运维等相关操作封装成安全、简单的工具或命令。
zh.feature_detail_one: 同方云 Ops 培训课程分为100系列、200系列、300系列、400系列四个级别，涵盖LinU  型基础、OpenStack 知识、报表与监控、自动化水平以及运维方法论。
zh.preview_description: 同方云培训基于能力角色，对技术开发或技术服务相关岗位进行角色定义，按能力进行分类，包括不限于：研发团队（包括DevOps团队）、技术服务团队、运维团队和实施与项目经理团队，并基于角色定义设定了包括OpenStack Ops认证课程、Solution Architect认证课程、DevOps认证课程和Technical Architect认证课程等四大类专业OpenStack技术认证体系，以及通识课程和专业课程等两大类计算机及云计算综合培训体系。方便学员自我定位，按照目标岗位的能力指定培训蓝图。
zh.split_list_intro_one: 四大技术团队认证体系专业分级课程设置
zh.split_list_intro_three: 丰富实验课程注重最佳实践
zh.split_list_intro_two: 课件、作业、考试全流程打造专业性
zh.list_one_detail: 四大技术团队认证体系
zh.title: 同方云 - 技术培训
zh.us_detail: 开源云计算领域有一个重要的特点就是包罗万象，几乎将IT领域所有的技术都囊括其中，对人的知识深度和广度的要求极高，同方云通识课程就是帮助所有技术线的工程师为后续的高强度专业训练打牢基础。该课程适用所有技术线的工程师，包含研发、解决方案架构师、项目经理、运维、实施、技术服务等角色。
zh.us_detail_one: 同方云通识培训课程分为100系列、110系列、120系列三个级别，涵盖计算机基础课程、Linux、C/C++、Python高级开发、软件测试与质量控制、企业运维与 DevOps 基础、开源文化等多个方面。
